officialTitle: Phase I, Open-label, Dose-Ranging Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Immunogenicity of GLS-5700 Administered ID Followed by EP in Dengue Virus-Naïve Adults

primary.measure: Number of Participants With Serious Adverse Events From Day 0 Through Week 60

secondary.measure: Binding Antibody Response to Zika Envelope
secondary.description: Serum samples were analyzed on enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) to measure binding-antibody responses to recombinant vaccine-matched ZIKV envelope (rZIKV-E) protein and reported as the number of participants who responded.
PBMCs were tested in enzyme-linked immunospot (ELISPOT) assay to detect the production of interferon-γ-secreting cells in response to stimulation with ZIKV premembrane and envelope peptides
secondary.timeFrame: Maximum response over follow up period up to 60 weeks.
